𓋴𓊪𓈖𓂝𓊛 spin! 𓊜
shâphoina ال سفينة (ship)

𓊪𓈖𓂝𓊛 pan ܦܢܐ pna 𓊪𓈖𓂝𓈖𓂝𓊜 turn over and over > panning > wenden wanken schwenken
𓊜 pan 𓊪𓈖𓂝𓇋𓇋 WENDE

pan band bend 𓈄𓃀 wende 𓅱𓂧𓃀𓄲𓂻 turn

𓊪 𓈖 𓂝 𓇋 𓇋 | reversal | ܦܢܐ pna פָּנָה pānâ (turn, return)
𓊪 𓈖 𓂝 𓇋 𓇋 | reversal | WENDE +++ < bend < pan < pending pendulum (hanging upside down)
𓊪 𓈖 𓂝 𓊛 | turn upside down, turn (the eyes against someone) |
𓊪 𓈖 𓂝 𓈖 𓂝 𓊜 | turn over and over | wenden / kentern 𓊪:kou
